name: Afterlife Assistance Agency
description:
**Just another day on the job**

These colorful characters have lived a long, fruitful life, but they've had it too good for too long!

You've been contracted to harvest the souls of those designated to meet their maker.

**Controls**

Left click on a character to pick them up

Drop them in the coffin peacefully terminate their existence

Get as many as you can before time runs out!

**Credits**

Coding : Christian Hamelain https://twitter.com/guriid0

Antoine Cointe https://twitter.com/Grotfang_

Art : Axel Signargout https://twitter.com/fishmasterino
